name: node-red-webapp
description: A webapp wrapper for running node-red in an Azure Web App

scripts.postinstall: (if not exist .nodered mkdir .nodered) && copy npm_.cmd .nodered\npm_.cmd && cd .nodered && npm install node-red-dashboard node-red-contrib-azure-iot-hub node-red-contrib-cognitive-services node-red-contrib-azure-blob-storage node-red-contrib-azure-table-storage node-red-contrib-azure-sql node-red-contrib-azure-documentdb && copy npm_.cmd npm.cmd /y && cd .. && copy npm_.cmd npm.cmd /y

author: jmservera
